measured_by: two-box peripheral dot detection accuracy task with varying box separation
justification: "In the first session… their task was to identify whether a small dot had appeared… Data from this session was then used to calculate the separation between boxes at which participants were 75% accurate in detecting the target."

measured_by: proportion of fixations to side vs. central boxes recorded with Eyelink 1000 eye-tracker
justification: "Fixations were coded as being either a central fixation… or as a side fixation… A proportion was then calculated for how often the participant fixated one of the side boxes as a function of box distance."
"Rate of success was modelled… Initial analysis for rate of success examined the overall accuracy for each participant."
